supportMessage.value:

**PROCESS_ID**:  @{pipeline().parameters.process_id}  \n
**CATEGORY**: @{pipeline().parameters.category} \n
**PHASE_ID**:   @{pipeline().parameters.phase_id}   \n
**USECASE_ID**: @{pipeline().parameters.usecase_id} \n
**SEQUENCE_ID**: @{pipeline().parameters.sequence_id} \n
**CONTAINER**: @{pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].container} \n
**FOLDER_PATH**: @{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.environment, 'prod'),'prd', pipeline().globalParameters.environment)}/@{pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].FOLDER_PATH}@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].hasDateInPath,'Y'),formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Singapore Standard Time'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'')} \n
**FILE_NAME**: @{pipeline().parameters.sourceFileName} \n
**SHEET_NAME**: @{item()} \n
**ERROR**: _@{activity('converttocsv sheetwise').error?.message}_

businessMessage.value:
There is some issue with source file. Following are the details of the file: \n
**FOLDER_PATH**: @{pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].container}/@{if(equals(pipeline().globalParameters.environment, 'prod'),'prd', pipeline().globalParameters.environment)}/@{pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].FOLDER_PATH}@{if(equals(pipeline().parameters.Parameters.value[0].hasDateInPath,'Y'),formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(),'Singapore Standard Time'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),'')} \n
**FILE_NAME**: @{pipeline().parameters.sourceFileName} \n
**SHEET_NAME**: @{item()} \n
**ERROR**: _An issue is reported with this source file which loads data into @{pipeline().parameters.parameters.value[0].target_table} table under @{pipeline().parameters.parameters.value[0].target_schema} schema. Kindly fix and reupload._
